table.name: periodicstatement_last
table.viewSql: SELECT aa.facilityreferenceid, aa.reportreference, aa.reportcreationdate, aa.periodtype, aa.periodstartdate, aa.periodenddate, aa.balanceatstart, aa.balanceatend, aa.totalinterestpaid, aa.totalinterestchargepaid, aa.totalfeespaid, aa.totalothercostspaid, aa.totaldebit, aa.totalcredit, aa.volgnr, fac.referenceid FROM (( SELECT sz_periodicstatement.facilityreferenceid, sz_periodicstatement.reportreference, sz_periodicstatement.reportcreationdate, sz_periodicstatement.periodtype, sz_periodicstatement.periodstartdate, sz_periodicstatement.periodenddate, sz_periodicstatement.balanceatstart, sz_periodicstatement.balanceatend, sz_periodicstatement.totalinterestpaid, sz_periodicstatement.totalinterestchargepaid, sz_periodicstatement.totalfeespaid, sz_periodicstatement.totalothercostspaid, sz_periodicstatement.totaldebit, sz_periodicstatement.totalcredit, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_periodicstatement.facilityreferenceid ORDER BY sz_periodicstatement.periodenddate DESC, sz_periodicstatement.reportcreationdate DESC) AS volgnr FROM wla.sz_periodicstatement WHERE ((sz_periodicstatement.periodtype)::text = 'MONTH'::text) ORDER BY sz_periodicstatement.facilityreferenceid, sz_periodicstatement.periodenddate) aa JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT sz_facility.referenceid FROM wla.sz_facility) fac ON (((fac.referenceid)::text = (aa.facilityreferenceid)::text))) WHERE (aa.volgnr = 1);

table.name: sz_agreement
table.remarks: Agreemnt details

column.name: startdate
column.remarks: The start date of this agreement

column.name: enddate
column.remarks: The end date of the agreement

column.name: reviewdate
column.remarks: The review date of the agreement

column.name: agreementperfect
column.remarks: Whether or not this credit agreement is perfect

column.name: datelastchanged
column.remarks: The date the credit agreement was last changed (and lead to a new actual version of this credit agreement)

column.name: externalreferenceid
column.remarks: Unique external reference identifier of an agreement

table.name: sz_annualaccounts
table.remarks: Annual accounts of a company

column.name: annualaccountsid
column.remarks: Internal identifier of the document (eg. document of type history)

column.name: financialsid
column.remarks: Identifier of a group of documents (History/SLI/Prognoses) regarding the same counterparty

table.name: sz_annualaccountsdetails
table.remarks: Details of annual accounts (every period is one record)

column.name: annualaccountsid
column.remarks: Internal indentifier of the document of the history application

column.name: columnenddate
column.remarks: End date of the column in the history application

column.name: ebitda
column.remarks: Profit and Loss: Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation and Amortisation

column.name: ProfitAfterTax
column.remarks: Profit and Loss: Profit After Tax

column.name: ValCheck
column.remarks: Balancesheet: Difference between Activa and Passiva (normally empty)

column.name: ChangeInInventories
column.remarks: Profit and Loss: Change In Inventories

column.name: DepreciationOfAssets
column.remarks: Profit and Loss: Depreciation Of Assets

column.name: ShareResultMinorityInterest
column.remarks: Profit and Loss: Share Result Minority Interest

column.name: STPartOfLTDebts
column.remarks: Balancesheet: Short Term Part of the Long Term Debts

table.name: sz_approval
table.remarks: Details of an approval (combination of businessrules)

column.name: referenceid
column.remarks: Referenceid of the approval (group of businessrules). This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: name
column.remarks: name of the approval (group of businessrules). This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: resultdescription
column.remarks: Result description in text. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: resultcode
column.remarks: Result code. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

table.name: sz_businessrules
table.remarks: Businessrules details

column.name: referenceid
column.remarks: UUID Unique identifier of this table.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Name of the business rule. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: initial_result
column.remarks: Initial result of the business rule determined by the application.

column.name: final_result
column.remarks: Initial result of the business rule.

column.name: overruled
column.remarks: Boolean which indicates if the businessrule is overruld

column.name: overrule_motivation
column.remarks: Motivation in text in case of overruling

column.name: rejection_reason
column.remarks: Motivation in text in case of rejection

column.name: referenceid_sequence
column.remarks: Sequence which is used for ordering

table.name: sz_businessrules_parameters
table.remarks: Details of businessrules parameters

column.name: parametername
column.remarks: Unique identifier name of a parameter

column.name: businessrulereferenceid_sequence
column.remarks: Sequence which is used for ordering

table.name: sz_calcmodel_customerbased
table.remarks: This are all models which are related to a customer - All models except models which are annualaccounts related, this info is available in other tables (e.g. sz_annnualaccounts) - only documents which are *not* marked as deleted)

column.name: documentid
column.remarks: Internal identifier of the document (eg. document of type history)

column.name: financialsid
column.remarks: Identifier of a group of documents regarding the same counterparty

table.name: sz_calcmodel_customerbaseddetails
table.remarks: Details of a customer based model

column.name: documentid
column.remarks: Internal indentifier of the document of the history application

column.name: columnenddate
column.remarks: Enddate of the column in case of a variable which is time dependent

column.name: variablename
column.remarks: Name of the variable in the calculation model.

column.name: stringvalue
column.remarks: In case of alfa-numeric value this column is filled.

column.name: numericvalue
column.remarks: In case of numeric value this column is filled.

table.name: sz_calcmodel_processbased
table.remarks: This are all models which are related to a process - All models except models which are annualaccounts related, this info is available in other tables (e.g. sz_annnualaccounts) - only documents which are *not* marked as deleted)

column.name: documentid
column.remarks: Internal identifier of the document (eg. document of type history)

column.name: financialsid
column.remarks: Identifier of a group of documents regarding the same counterparty

table.name: sz_calcmodel_processbaseddetails
table.remarks: Details of a process based model

column.name: documentid
column.remarks: Internal indentifier of the document of the history application

column.name: columnenddate
column.remarks: Enddate of the column in case of a variable which is time dependent

column.name: variablename
column.remarks: Name of the variable in the calculation model.

column.name: stringvalue
column.remarks: In case of alfa-numeric value this column is filled.

column.name: numericvalue
column.remarks: In case of numeric value this column is filled.

table.name: sz_collateral
table.remarks: Collateral details

column.name: definitioncode
column.remarks: This name is a customer specific fyndoo configuration

column.name: description
column.remarks: This name is a customer specific fyndoo configuration

column.name: valuationcurrency
column.remarks: The currency code for identification of the currency

column.name: externalreferenceid
column.remarks: Unique external reference identifier of an collateral

table.name: sz_collateral_object
table.remarks: Collateral object details

column.name: externalreferenceid
column.remarks: Unique external reference identifier of an collateral_object

column.name: prioramount
column.remarks: Prior amount in case rank of mortage > 1

column.name: colllateraltype
column.remarks: Description of collateraltype. This name is a customer specific fyndoo configuration

column.name: colllateraltypecode
column.remarks: Referencecode of collateraltype. This name is a customer specific fyndoo configuration

column.name: colllateraltypecategory
column.remarks: E.g.: Apartment, RealEstate, CommercialRealEstate, AgriculturalLand, Airplane, Ship, RealEstateWithOfficeSpace, OfficeSpace, Other

table.name: sz_collateral_object_rental
table.remarks: Rental details of a collateral object

table.name: sz_collateral_object_taxation
table.remarks: Taxation of collateral object details

column.name: valuationmethod
column.remarks: Method of valuation (e.g. 'Full expert', 'Desktop expert', 'Internal', 'Volgens balans', 'External', 'WOZ', 'Indexation')

column.name: valuationvalue
column.remarks: This is called 'marktwaarde' in the application. Correction is already applied on this value.

column.name: correctionpercentage
column.remarks: Market value correction percentage. eg: 0.9 is 90%

table.name: sz_contactperson
table.remarks: Contactperson of a process

table.name: sz_counterparty
table.remarks: Counterparty information. In combination with table sz_relation the relation of the counterparty can be determined.

column.name: postalcode
column.remarks: Free formatted postalcode, no specific country restrictions

column.name: isholding
column.remarks: Derived information and indicaties if the counterparty is a Holding company

column.name: counterpartysegmentcode
column.remarks: The segment code of this counterparty.

column.name: counterpartycategorycode
column.remarks: The counterparty category this counterparty belongs to.

column.name: foundationdate
column.remarks: The foundation date of the organisation

column.name: numberofemployees
column.remarks: The number of employees of the organisation

column.name: legalform
column.remarks: The legal form of a counterparty. Example values (nl): BV, NV, VOF. The values should correspond with the configured values in Force Business Lending.

column.name: countrycode
column.remarks: The country code that matches with a country description. The list of country descriptions can differ per customer installation.

column.name: sectorcodestandard
column.remarks: The standard sectorcode which is configured in Fyndoo

column.name: sectorcodecustom
column.remarks: The custom sectorcode which is configured in Fyndoo

column.name: externalreferenceid
column.remarks: Unique external reference identifier of an collateral_object

table.name: sz_counterparty_financials
table.remarks: Linking table to connect a counterparty to the financial figures of a company

column.name: financialsid
column.remarks: Identifier of a group of documents (History/SLI/Prognoses) regarding the same counterparty

table.name: sz_counterpartyrating
table.remarks: Details of a counterparty rating

column.name: RatingType
column.remarks: Rating type. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration

column.name: RatingValue
column.remarks: Rating value. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration

table.name: sz_facility
table.remarks: Facility details

column.name: mainfacilityreferenceid
column.remarks: Unique identifier of the main facility

column.name: productname
column.remarks: Name of the product configured in Fyndoo

column.name: productdefinitioncode
column.remarks: Definitioncode of product configured in Fyndoo

column.name: agreedlimitamount
column.remarks: The agreed or contractual limit on top-facility level.

column.name: agreedlimitcurrency
column.remarks: The currency code for identification of the currency

column.name: limitcurrency
column.remarks: The currency code for identification of the currency

column.name: facilitystartdate
column.remarks: The start date of the facility

column.name: facilityduration
column.remarks: The duration of the facility in months

column.name: facilityenddate
column.remarks: The end date of the facility

column.name: fixedrateperiod
column.remarks: Interest fixed rate period in months

column.name: loantovalue
column.remarks: LTV (loan to value) for this process

column.name: interestcoveragerationarrow
column.remarks: ICR narrow (interest coverage ratio narrow) for this process

column.name: interestcoverageratiobroad
column.remarks: ICR broad (interest coverage ratio broad) for this process

column.name: interestproductstartdate
column.remarks: Start date of interest fixedrate period

column.name: firstinterestpaymentdate
column.remarks: Date of the first interest payment

column.name: interestproductenddate
column.remarks: End date of interest fixedrate period

column.name: discounttype
column.remarks: Type of discount, possible options are: 'Commercial', 'Lender', 'Other'

column.name: interestratename
column.remarks: Interest productname e.g. '3 month Euribor + opslag'. This name is a customer specific fyndoo configuration

column.name: interestratecode
column.remarks: Interest productcode e.g. 'EU.IR.000003' This name is a customer specific fyndoo configuration

column.name: tenantformattedreferenceid
column.remarks: ReferenceId generated by Fyndoo, but tenant formatted

column.name: externalreferenceid
column.remarks: ReferenceId received from an external application

column.name: parenttenantformattedreferenceid
column.remarks: ReferenceId generated by Fyndoo, but tenant formatted of the parent facility

column.name: parentexternalreferenceid
column.remarks: ReferenceId received from an external application of the parent facility

table.name: sz_facilityreference
table.remarks: Linking table between periodic_statements and facilities

table.name: sz_fee_agreement
table.remarks: Details of the fee related to a agreement

table.name: sz_fee_facility
table.remarks: Details of the fee related to a facility

column.name: referenceid
column.remarks: Unique identifier of a fee facility

column.name: name
column.remarks: Unique identifier name of a fee. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: fiatamountofthefee
column.remarks: Fiat amount of the fee (currency ammount)

column.name: offeramountofthefee
column.remarks: Offer amount of the fee (currency ammount)

table.name: sz_financials
table.remarks: Table is used as Many-To-Many relation

column.name: financialsid
column.remarks: Identifier of a group of documents (History/SLI/Prognoses) regarding the same counterparty

table.name: sz_financinggoal
table.remarks: Financing goals details

column.name: referenceid
column.remarks: Unique identifier of a financing goal.

column.name: definitioncode
column.remarks: Code of financinggoal. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of financinggoal. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

table.name: sz_otherproperties
table.remarks: Details fo other properties of a process

table.name: sz_periodicstatement
table.remarks: Table with periodic_statements of the Fyndoo Pay & Collect application

column.name: reportreference
column.remarks: Unique identifier for the periodic statement

column.name: balanceatstart
column.remarks: Outstanding amount at startdate of period

column.name: balanceatend
column.remarks: Outstanding amount at enddate of period

column.name: totalinterestchargepaid
column.remarks: Total interest charges paid in period

column.name: totalothercostspaid
column.remarks: Total other costs (not fees or interest charges) paid in period

column.name: totalcredit
column.remarks: Actual repayment (f greater than totaldebit then it is an additional repayment

table.name: sz_process
table.remarks: Details of a process

column.name: processname
column.remarks: Description of process. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration

column.name: whitelabel
column.remarks: White label name. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration

column.name: externalreferencecontract
column.remarks: Unique external identifier of a contract

column.name: externalreferencerequest
column.remarks: Unique external identifier of a request

column.name: processstatus
column.remarks: Status of the process (0 = in progress / 1 = closed)

column.name: durationtimehours
column.remarks: Duration of the process based on begin and startdate

column.name: currentstatus
column.remarks: Actual status name. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration

column.name: loanpassingdate
column.remarks: Date of passing date of a loan (optional, not applicable for all processtypes

column.name: numberofstatuschanges
column.remarks: Number of status changes of the process

column.name: firsttimeright
column.remarks: Are all statuschange unique, the firsttime right is true

column.name: teamcode
column.remarks: The teamcode of the process. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: channel
column.remarks: Channel name of the process. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: processtype
column.remarks: processtype e.g. LoanOrigination, LoanReview, LoanModification, etc.

column.name: mainadministrator
column.remarks: User which is the main administrator of the process. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: currentstatuscode
column.remarks: Actual status CODE . This CODE is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration

table.name: sz_processevents
table.remarks: Details of process events

column.name: conditionalofferdate_hours
column.remarks: Number of hours from start process to date of conditional offer

column.name: bindingofferdate_hours
column.remarks: Number of hours from start process to date of binding offer

column.name: processedfinancialfiguresauto
column.remarks: Indication (boolean) if the financial figures are automatically processed by the application

column.name: offersent
column.remarks: Indication (boolean) if an offer is sent.

column.name: finishedsuccessful
column.remarks: True if the process has reached a successful status

column.name: finishedsuccessfuldate
column.remarks: Date and time of when the process has reached a successful status

table.name: sz_processstatuschange
table.remarks: Details of all statuschanges of a process

column.name: code
column.remarks: Process statuschange code. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Process statuschange name. This name is a customer specific Fyndoo configuration.

column.name: userreferenceid
column.remarks: User reference id of the person who initiate the statuschange

column.name: workingdaysinstatus
column.remarks: Number of workingdays of this statuschange

table.name: sz_relation
table.remarks: Associative table implementing the many-to-many relation between Agreement and Counterparty

column.name: borrowerrelationtype
column.remarks: Type of borrower relation (Main borrower or Borrower)

table.name: sz_sli
table.remarks: SLI = Statement after Loan Issuing

column.name: sliid
column.remarks: Internal identifier of the document (eg. document of type history)

column.name: financialsid
column.remarks: Identifier of a group of documents (History/SLI/Prognoses) regarding the same counterparty

table.name: sz_slidetails
table.remarks: Details of SLI = Statement after Loan Issuing

column.name: sliid
column.remarks: Internal indentifier of the document of the history application

column.name: columnenddate
column.remarks: End date of the column in the history application

column.name: ebitda
column.remarks: Profit and Loss: Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation and Amortisation

column.name: ProfitAfterTax
column.remarks: Profit and Loss: Profit After Tax

column.name: ValCheck
column.remarks: Balancesheet: Difference between Activa and Passiva (normally empty)

column.name: ChangeInInventories
column.remarks: Profit and Loss: Change In Inventories

column.name: DepreciationOfAssets
column.remarks: Profit and Loss: Depreciation Of Assets

column.name: ShareResultMinorityInterest
column.remarks: Profit and Loss: Share Result Minority Interest

column.name: STPartOfLTDebts
column.remarks: Balancesheet: Short Term Part of the Long Term Debts

table.name: sz_user
table.remarks: User details
